mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.xunjianid AS "xunjianid", a.xunjianstatus AS "xunjianstatus", a.userId AS "userId.id", a.jieshusj AS "jieshusj", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM xunjian_jilu a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.xunjianid LIKE '%'||#{xunjianid}||'%' '%'+#{xunjianid}+'%' concat('%',#{xunjianid},'%')
AND a.remarks LIKE '%'||#{remarks}||'%' '%'+#{remarks}+'%' concat('%',#{remarks},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xunjian_jilu( id, xunjianid, xunjianstatus, jieshusj, userId, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{xunjianid}, #{xunjianstatus}, #{jieshusj}, #{userId.id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xunjian_jilu SET xunjianid = #{xunjianid}, xunjianstatus = #{xunjianstatus}, jieshusj = #{jieshusj}, userId=#{userId.id}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
